v8:item.v8:content: This folder is stored in cloud service <link 1>%</>1.
The last file synchronization failed. Possible reasons: cloud service issues, Internet connection issues, or other issues. See the Event log for details.
Context menu digital signature commands group
Indicates whether the file is digitally signed or encrypted.

Settings.QueryText: SELECT Files.BeingEditedBy, Files.CreationDate, CAST(Files.Size / 1024 AS NUMBER(10, 0)) AS CurrentVersionSize, Files.Author, Files.Extension AS Extension, CASE WHEN Files.DeletionMark = TRUE THEN Files.PictureIndex + 1 ELSE Files.PictureIndex END AS PictureIndex, Files.Description, SUBSTRING(Files.LongDesc, 0, 140) AS LongDesc, Files.Ref, Files.DeletionMark, Files.StoreVersions, Files.FileOwner, Files.ChangedBy AS WasEditedBy, CASE WHEN Files.BeingEditedBy = &CurrentUser THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS CurrentUserEditsFile, CASE WHEN NOT Files.BeingEditedBy IN (&EmptyUsers) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS FileBeingEdited, Files.SignedWithDS AS SignedWithDS, Files.Encrypted AS Encrypted, CASE WHEN Files.SignedWithDS AND Files.Encrypted THEN 2 WHEN Files.Encrypted THEN 1 WHEN Files.SignedWithDS THEN 0 ELSE -1 END AS SignedEncryptedPictureNumber, DATEADD(Files.UniversalModificationDate, SECOND, &SecondsToLocalTime) AS ChangeDate, Files.IsInternal AS IsInternal, FilesEncoding.Encoding FROM Catalog.Files AS Files LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.FilesEncoding AS FilesEncoding ON Files.CurrentVersion = FilesEncoding.File WHERE (Files.FileOwner = &Owner OR NOT &UseHierarchy AND Files.FileOwner REFS Catalog.FilesFolders)

v8:item.v8:content: File being edited by current user

Settings.QueryText: SELECT FilesFolders.Ref, FilesFolders.DeletionMark, FilesFolders.Predefined, FilesFolders.Parent, FilesFolders.Code, FilesFolders.Description, FilesFolders.LongDesc, FilesFolders.EmployeeResponsible, FilesFolders.CreationDate, FilesFolders.Presentation, CASE WHEN FilesSynchronizationWithCloudServiceStatuses.File = FilesFolders.Ref THEN 2 WHEN FilesFolders.DeletionMark = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS PictureIndex, CASE WHEN FilesSynchronizationWithCloudServiceStatuses.File = FilesFolders.Ref THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS FolderSynchronizationEnabled, FilesSynchronizationWithCloudServiceStatuses.Href, FilesSynchronizationWithCloudServiceStatuses.Account.Description, FilesSynchronizationWithCloudServiceStatuses.Account.Service, FilesSynchronizationWithCloudServiceStatuses.SynchronizationDateStart, FilesSynchronizationWithCloudServiceStatuses.Account AS Account, FilesSynchronizationWithCloudServiceStatuses.IsSynchronized FROM Catalog.FilesFolders AS FilesFolders LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.FilesSynchronizationWithCloudServiceStatuses AS FilesSynchronizationWithCloudServiceStatuses ON FilesFolders.Ref = FilesSynchronizationWithCloudServiceStatuses.File

v8:item.v8:content: Upload a file from your computer or other device.
Save the file and release it in the infobase.
Mark the file as locked for editing.
Lock the file and open it for editing.
Save the modified file to the infobase.
Save the file to a computer or another device
Update from a file on a computer or another device
Create a file from a template.
